# Accelerator

A mod that adds blocks which speed up both crops and blocks.

## MORE DETAILS:
- Gives random ticks to crops every 2 ticks
- Gives 10 ticks to Tile Entities every tick

## SHOWCASE VIDEO

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wKOVZmdQXdo

# Accelerator

A mod that adds blocks which speed up both crops and blocks.

## MORE DETAILS:
- Gives random ticks to crops every 2 ticks
- Gives 10 ticks to Tile Entities every tick
